review_text: We literally loved everything about the loft! It‚Äôs adorable and comfortable and you feel right at home!! Such a comfortable and unique place to stay. The loft was well equipped with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. We loved the restaurants and shops in downtown. We will definitely be back. Thanks for your responsiveness and hospitality!

Awesome place to stay that is right in the middle of everything you need on a weekend getaway! The place is extremely clean and we were greeted with a cute welcome sign along with a bunch of snacks for our stay! We would definitely stay again!

We enjoyed staying at the Century House during graduation weekend! The home was immaculate and the hosts were helpful and kind. It was a great place to stay with our family of five!

Barb and Jim,

My sisters and I are so grateful to you both for making our stay so special!

Marian, Florence, Nancy and Gail

Absolutely AMAZING experience! Barb is a fabulous host who goes above and beyond to ensure your stay is perfect from start to finish. Loved the place, great for our two nights of stay!
Thanks for everything!

Yes, they really care about the property and your experience of it. We had a great time grilling and then sitting around the gazebo or the dining room table, playing games and music. Excellent place for a moderate gathering.
Barb was a delight to work with from start to finish. The home is beautiful and we all felt right at home!

We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful, peaceful home in the country. Barb was such a kind host! The coffee cake she made for us was delicious. Great bedrooms and bathrooms, a gorgeous big dining table, and cozy living room and a front porch and back porch. There is also a fantastic gazebo in the backyard. We had a lovely time and definitely recommend The Century House. We would love to come back!

The Century House was beautiful. Jim had done some extensive updating. Barb's coffee cake was amazing. We enjoyed our many chats with the two of them. Spent many hours sitting on the gazebo. I would recommend this wonderful place to stay!

Our second time visiting Century House, and it doesn‚Äôt disappoint. Barb and Jim have maintained a wonderful country home that is convenient to town and restaurants, but also a wonderful place to relax and make your own meals. My friends and I really love his special spot.

The century house is a beautiful house that you feel like home. It is stacked with every thing you need and with a view on a corn field and fresh eggs made our stay more enjoyable.
Jim & Barb hospitality were exceptional . They were kind and care. I definitely recommend it
Lovely home, so peaceful. Barb was a wonderful hostess! We will be back!

We‚Äôve stayed here twice now and absolutely love it! The house is immaculate and well stocked. Barb and Jim are so lovely and helpful. We needed a screw driver one day for my nephew‚Äôs toy car and Jim came over quickly with three different ones to help us out. Barb always makes a coffee cake and it is the best coffee cake we‚Äôve ever had! We fully intend to stay here again in the future!

Our weekend stay at Jim and Barb's Century Farmhouse was wonderful. It was a beautiful setting and perfect location for us to gather with extended family, to attend a family reunion nearby. We had 6 adults and 2 children, and had plenty of space and amenities for all of us to enjoy and be comfortable. Barb met us upon arrival, and was beyond friendly and helpful in showing us the house and explaining everything. I've previously stayed in numerous Airbnbs, and this was the cleanest and most beautiful property that I've been at. The kitchen and bathroom were stocked with extra items (more than mentioned in the listing), so we had plenty of what was needed, and more. The Chandlers are very gracious hosts, and we were pleasantly surprised with a delicious treat of homemade coffee cake. Thank you so much for allowing us to enjoy your special retreat.
Loved the house, loved the property, loved the location. Jim and Barb were great hosts!

We had a wonderful first visit to this lovely home. Our team would be glad to stay again. Beautiful location close to Ashland. Highly recommend for families. Hosts were very welcoming. Thanks again! Diana
My family and I enjoyed our stay at the Century House. Barb and Jim‚Äôs hospitality was tremendous. We enjoyed playing in the yard and seeing the steers and chickens. We will be back.

Barb was such a tremendous host! She was always happy to help in any way! Jim was also helpful in making our stay comfortable. We appreciate them both as we stayed in the beautiful farm house! Our son loved the bunk beds and the backyard to play soccer.
We have stayed at this place at least 4 times now. We love how wonderful and clean the place is and the hospitality of Barb and Jim. Great place, highly recommend!
You can‚Äôt ask for a better host or a well stocked house. And the coffee cake is second to none!
This space is so much more than a rental home--it's a try oasis! For a retreat in the country with all the ease of proximity to convenience, this is your dream find!
This location is everything you could hope for and more. By and far the best Airbnb experience we have ever had.

We enjoyed our stay at this home while in town for a near by wedding. The house was clean and well stocked. Home was conveniently located near several stores and restaurants. Would recommend to any friend :) As many have noted the coffee cake was a yummy addition to our stay.
A wonderful property!
We had a great time and it was a wonderful place to have our children!
Barb and Jim are absolutely ideal hosts. The Century Farmhouse felt like home right away. I can hardly wait to be back!

Century house is such a cozy and beautiful place to stay. It made the perfect relaxing weekend getaway for our girls weekend, and Barb is such a warm and inviting hostess. She also makes the BEST coffee cake we‚Äôve ever had!

ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL HOME!!! We had a wonderful stay and as everyone already knows the coffee cake does not disappoint! I grew up in the Ashland area but now live in Pennsylvania, I brought family back to my home town for a weekend girls trip and this was the perfect location for relaxation and still being close to downtown Ashland for food and shopping! Barb and Jim are wonderful hosts and have the house well stocked and in perfect shape!
Great place to stay. We hope to stay again on our next visit to Ashland. The house was very clean and comfortable!

The house is spacious, very clean and fully stocked with all the essentials and more for a comfortable stay! The views and surroundings are beautiful but best of all Barb and Jim are wonderful hosts - attentive, friendly and generous. We loved our stay!
Beautiful home and perfect place for a restful stay in Ashland.

5 stars! House was exactly as advertised. The only improvements I might suggest is adding fans in the bedrooms. The A/C doesn't quite cool things down enough upstairs. The home is well equipped and the woodwork is beautiful. The gazebo was the perfect gathering place outside. A great rural setting, but not far from civilization at all. We will book this home again for sure!

We really enjoyed staying at Century House! The home was clean, comfortable & well stocked with everything we needed (& then some! It provided a relaxing haven for our time in Ashland!! Enjoyed the gazebo and the coffee cake was to die for! Thank you!

The home was very clean and quiet! The house was a perfect size for my groomsman to stay for the weekend. Barb communicated very well and would highly recommend if you have any reason to stay the night in Ashland. Also the homemade coffee cake was amazing!
Wonderful place to stay
This home is just perfect.
This was an amazing stay! Barb is so accommodating and made us so comfortable. The house itself was the cleanest I have ever stayed in and super nice.

By now, you've heard about the coffee cake. You may want to roll your eyes thinking, "It can't be THAT good." Well, it is THAT good. We'll be back, for a lot of reasons... coffee cake among them :)
Our first repeat Airbnb visit - this is such a great property and Barb and Jim are great hosts.
A homely house with hospitable hosts.
A beautiful home, highly recommend!

Happy to come back again to the Farmhouse!
Our family has stayed at the farmhouse multiple times when visiting the Ashland-Mansfield area and always thoroughly enjoy it, no matter the time of year.
Barb was an amazing host. She was very welcoming and even made the most delicious cake.

Barb's place was absolutely fantastic. We had more than enough space for the entire family, a big kitchen with everything we needed to cook, and Barb was a great host who was quick to respond to any questions. I definitely recommend renting her place.

Barb and Jim are wonderful hosts and have a lovely farmhouse with all the amenities! We know we're staying in luxury accommodations at one of their properties, with all the details thoughtfully, and lovingly, completed. We've stayed at this property in the summer and winter - both seasons have been a wonderful visit for us.

Barb's house is wonderful- cozy, clean and very well equipped! We were able to cook a complete Thanksgiving dinner in the great kitchen and were thankful for the extras staples and the delicious coffee cake! Barb is friendly and welcoming and the location was perfect for us!
Definitely recommend.
Barb‚Äôs place was everything we could ask for and more. Literally the perfect location and the best host. Also, best coffee cake we‚Äôve ever had. Would definitely recommend!

Century House was exactly as described in the overview as well as all the wonderful reviews. Barb's communication is fantastic and we appreciated the personal greeting. The coffee cake was to die for! The house is very convenient to Ashland University if you're looking for a terrific place to come home to after events there. The kitchen is well equipped and the large table was great for us. We had a going away family breakfast before we left for home after Senior Weekend at Ashland and had everything we needed. Wow! This place wasn‚Äôt only lovely but Jim and Barb definitely have the gift of hospitality. Their home is not only beautiful but clean. There is a sense of peace when you drive up to the property with its stately trees. The kitchen is fully equipped (even a crockpot) and ready to be used. Definitely an A+ In our book.

Barb is a wonderful host who responds promptly and goes above and beyond to make her guests feel at home. We were greeted with a nice touch, but I won't spoil the surprise. Let's just say it really hit the spot!
We had an unusual situation with a surprise cancellation at another host's property which required a sudden booking at the Century House. Barb helped us deal with the logistics issues inherent in people coming in from 3 different cities. She might not think she did much, but she really helped to put us at ease as we dealt with all of the challenges we had with our trip.
My wife and I noticed her other mid-century home listing and we're already talking about possibly staying there in the future for another little getaway from the big city.

I can't say enough good things about Barb and The Century House. We had an unforgettable weekend there! The house and property are immaculate and the owner's attention to detail is simply outstanding! The house had all the amenities you could possibly need and she even gave us a quick tour to explain the history of the house and how much work they've put into it. It's only a few miles from a cute downtown area and other local attractions. We enjoyed our stay so much that we are already planning our trip back next year. We couldn't have had a better experience staying at Jim and Barb's farmhouse. They are just the best. The coffee cake is out of this world. Not to mention Jim let me help him feed his steers. Great place to stay. Exactly as you would want it to be.
barb and Jim and very kind and even baked us a coffee cake. very friendly

Century House is our go-to place to stay when visiting family in Ashland. We have stayed there three times now so it feels like coming home when we arrive. The house is super clean with lots of linens and plenty of towels for 8 people. Barb is very responsive to questions via the Air BNB site. She goes out of her way to be accommodating and her welcome coffee cake is to die for!!

Century House is beautiful & very comfortable. Barb graciously welcomed us & left an absolutely delicious coffee cake for us. We loved the history & charm of the house. Convenient location with a bit of traffic noise but not a big issue. Would definitely stay again.

Barb‚Äôs place is fabulous! We had a wonderful stay while in town for a family gathering! The location is great! It‚Äôs a quiet, lovely, country setting, but still close to amenities. The home is equipped with everything we needed! We will definitely book again!

Barb is an excellent hostess who is very easy to work with.

This house is so charming and fit all our needs and expectations! Barb and

This place is a gem and the hosts are incredible. Highest recommendation.

Spacious farm house with modern conveniences! The bunk room. Was perfect for the kids.
The house is located close to lots of activities and shopping. We‚Äôll be back!
The Century House is a most unique and impressive retreat in an excellent location. We would definitely return. The hosts are super responsive though not intrusive.

Great house, scenic are, super quiet and rural but also really close to anything you need. The house is clean, beautiful, and well furnished. Barb was a perfect host. The cows in the barn behind the house add to quite the farm ambiance! Perfect for a family week and getaway.

What a perfect stay we had for our family celebration!! Barb and Jim provided a wonderfully refurbished farmhouse with the backdrop of Ashland countryside! Great place to stay. This was my first adventure with AirB&B and it was perfect.
The location to downtown activity and the golf courses couldn‚Äôt have been better.

Barb and Jim are hands down the best hosts we've encountered on Airbnb. So warm, and their personal touches like decorating their place for Easter for us was just wonderful. Plus, Barb's coffee cake was top notch. Listing is exactly as described - perfect for a quiet family weekend getaway.
great

Great place. It was comfortable for a family of 4 adults and 4 children. Very clean. Nice amenities- we were able to cook a nice meal with the kitchen supplies on hand. Convenient location.

There are two great parks for walking/running a few minute drive away, we got a fascinating tour of Jim's small-scale cattle operation, and enjoyed the best coffee cake I've ever had as a welcome gift from Barb. Highly recommend. A beautiful home and location. Welcoming, friendly hosts. We will come back!

Oh! And the pumpkin coffee cake she made for us might be the best we've ever had. Such a sweet place and experience. Five stars for sure!
It really is as great as the pictures look. Wonderful property and hosts.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Century Home. It was the perfect spot to rest and relax in between our rounds of golf. Barb and Jim are extremely hospitable and Barb gave us a personal tour upon checking in (and had a freshly baked coffee cake waiting for us!). She even recommended a few golf courses in the area. Our two families stayed for nearly two weeks at the Farmhouse and loved it! We unfortunately had to work (remotely) while there, but there was plenty of room and excellent WiFi to support us. We'll be back!

A great place to stay when in Ashland. Start the morning sipping your coffee and eating the delicious coffee cake on the front porch swing or in the gazebo in the back yard. Very nice folks!

Century house is a nice fully updated old home that is perfect for a relaxing get away to the country. We enjoyed the stars across the clear night sky, fireflys in the field across the street From the gazebo at night and relaxing on the front porch swing.

The Century House was a beautiful home for our daughter‚Äôs surprise proposal and family weekend! The owners have put thought into every detail and made it a place we will return to! Sunrise to sunset to fireflies in the fields - it was like a dream come true!
Expect AMAZING!!! Coffee Cake and a perfect house. It was such a great time and Barb was the perfect host
Both houses owned by Barb are in spectacular condition and the perfect place for a group to get ready in preparation for a wedding or for a relaxing and cozy stay!

My daughter was married at Mohican Gardens and we rented the house for my daughter and her bridesmaids to stay the night before and day of the wedding. It was perfect! This is our families second stay at the Century House and talks are in the works for the third. Anything you can imagine that you may need is there. They make me want a farmhouse!! Dont hesitate at all to book with them.
Wonderful hospitality and great place to stay! If we come to this area again, we will definitely stay here.
Barb and Jim are wonderful hosts. Whatever your reason for visiting the area, they will make your visit to Century House memorable!

Our stay at Century House was wonderful. We loved the location as it was so close to family. The home was clean, comfortable and a blessing to our family. Barb and Jim were wonderful ( and we learned a lot about cows .) We will be returning soon!
You will not want for anything with this rental. I am so use to packing half of my house and this trip didnt touch the items at all. Highly recommended, we will be back for sure.
Perfect place for our bridal party to get ready.

This is our second time staying at Century House. We love this updated spacious house set in a charming rural area. We had everything we needed for a comfortable stay for our entire family. Barb is an excellent host who quickly responded to all of my inquiries. We will definitely be back!

Century House was nestled in a country setting but still close enough to run to a store if you needed anything that you forgot. Jim and Barb are great host, and house and property were beautiful. We enjoyed the fresh vegetables that were left on the steps, and the warm coffee cake was great!
Farmhouse is Amazing! No expense has been sparred to renovate this place. We absolutely loved the place and our stay. Very tranquil!

What an awesome place to stay!! Beautiful inside and out!
Hospitality was amazing. We will stay here again!
Dee

This was our second time, and will always be our place when visiting Mid Ohio.
See you again Next Year!
Wonderful, relaxing location with hosts who pay attention to detail.

Barb and Jim are amazing hosts. They greeted us at the house, gave us a tour of the property, then let us enjoy our stay. Places to visit and places to eat brocheurs are provided.

Owners of the property take pride of all aspects. They treat the property as if it was there own living space. We will book our next stay with Barb.

If you are looking for a a peaceful and secluded space, nestled in a peaceful environment, to share with friends and family this is your place! The Century home is clean, well cared for and stocked with everything needed to make your stay comfortable. The homemade coffee cake is to die for!

Great home for a family reunion! Beautiful, serene, clean and cozy. Wonderful hospitality and country feeling with the cows, chickens, gardens, flowers, homemade coffee cake and gorgeous space to dine and share great conversations in. Much appreciation to Barb and Jim for the wonderful work they have put into restoring this house. It is a lovely country homestead!

Century House is a beautiful and well-appointed as the photos promise. There were seven of us, all adults, in the area for our son's graduation. The farm was a cool, green and shady respite from the all the on-campus activities. The house and grounds are comfortable and everything in the house is in splendid working order. And Barb's coffee cake is unbeatable! I fully recommend staying here.
Beautiful, comfortable, immaculate home. Gracious hostess and host. Great place for a family get together.
The perfect place for our holiday visit to Ashland! Very clean and thoughtful touches galore. The coffee cake waiting for our arrival was described as the "best I've ever eaten".

Barb and her husband Jim were so friendly and welcoming, it was almost like being greeted by family. The house was lovely, clean, comfortable and so cozy for us. We were so happy to come home to it everyday. I highly, highly recommend it if you are in the area!

This was a perfect location for our family Thanksgiving and celebration of my granddaughter's 5th birthday! Barb and Jim were so welcoming and gracious- the perfect hosts!

This is one of the most beautiful and peaceful Air B&B locations I have ever visited. Secluded enough to relax but close enough to local food and shops if we needed to grab something. Everything about this home was a delight - including the hosts.

Beautiful home. You will instantly love it. I wasn't sure I could get my wife to leave. We had a group of 8. Plenty of space for all. Barb and Jim made this stay perfect. We arrived to a delicious cake and info on a local church we wanted to attend. They are the ideal hosts. We will be back!!
